briefTitle: Genetic Modulation of Working Memory in Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
officialTitle: Genetic Modulation of Functional Brain Activity of Attention-deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder-related Working Memory Processes
summary: In this study the investigators will measure the functional brain activity of adult Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) patients, genotyped according to the COMT genotype, during a Working Memory Paradigm, before and after a placebo controlled treatment with MPH for 6 WEEKS. Within this design, the investigators will be able to evaluate the therapeutic effect of MPH treatment on cognitive functions.
